DOC.brief_summary: This project examine effectiveness Youth Chef Academy ( YCA ) , classroom-based experiential culinary nutrition literacy curriculum middle-school student . The primary study hypothesis student assign YCA would demonstrate great improvement F/V whole grain consumption compare student control group . Eight classroom eight public K-8 school participate project . Classrooms assign intervention control condition non-randomized manner . YCA delivered project staff student four intervention classroom . Students complete survey ass primary secondary outcome baseline , six-week curriculum completion , twelve-week curriculum completion ( YCA extend twelve-week curriculum cohort ) .
